general.gigTitle: convert figma design to develop responsive wordpress website with elementor pro

sellerCard.oneLiner: Helping Businesses Reimagine Their Digital Presence!
sellerCard.description: Are you ready to take your online presence to the next level? Hi, I'm Fatema, and I help businesses, professionals, and entrepreneurs like yourself stand out, build trust, and effectively convey your brand through a winning web presence. After all, your website is the "Digital Home" of your brand and the endpoint of all your marketing efforts, so why not? I'll be by your side the entire process, from research and planning to design and launch. Let's make it happen together, schedule a call with me now and let's talk about how we can collaborate to achieve your website goals!

description.content:
LOOKING TO CONVERT YOUR FIGMA WEB DESIGN TO WORDPRESS WEBSITE?


Well, look no further! I'm Fatema, and I help businesses, professionals and entrepreneurs stand out with a winning web presence. After all, your website is the "Digital Home" of your identity and the endpoint of all your marketing.


THIS SERVICE IS FOR YOU IF YOU ARE A:

  • agency looking for white-label service
  • or a business who have already designed their website in house


HOW DOES THIS WORK?

Right after you place your order, I will send you a link to schedule our initial clarity call (STANDARD & PREMIUM PLAN). I will understand your needs for the project and review the Figma design. I will implement it on WordPress with Elementor Pro and get the website ready to launch.


WHAT'S ADDITIONAL?

  • 1 Year of Elementor PRO ($50+ Value)!!
  • 30 Days of FREE Support after delivery
  • FREE Guidance & Walkthrough for Non-Techies


READY TO DIVE IN? Let's Talk! Please inbox and discuss your project before placing your order! THANK YOU! :)


*MUST read all FAQS to understand the process and details further.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to provide access to your Web hosting, domain, WordPress Dashboard, and Figma File.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to buy any plugins or theme?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In most cases, no. If your website requires the use of a premium plugin or theme, I will instruct you to get it before we start the project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also write custom HTML, CSS, JS, shortcodes?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do write custom code when needed. I custom quote these as an additional charge.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What count as a revision?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: All minor edits, like changes in the text, image, and color, count as a revision. You can ask for multiple minor edits in one revision. Any changes in the requirements or the scope of the project do not come under revision and will be subjected to an additional charge.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will it be pixel perfect and responsive implementation?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, the design will be responsive, and closely matched to the Figma design. Any limitation, while implementing the design with Elementor Pro will be communicated.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why your prices are too high/ too low?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I believe my prices are fairly reasonable (neither high nor low) given the value and experience I am bringing to the table. I also have to take into account my expenses including the web design tools, courses to keep myself updated, the cost to sustain a small team, and 20% Fiverr service charges.

reviews.comment: very good communication. Hit some snags with respect to speed but she was very clear on why it was an issue, nothing to really dock her for. Overall great experience, will work with again.

seller_response.comment: Thank you Kyle for the wonderful feedback, hope we do business again :)

reviews.comment: Fatema was SO easy to work with-- friendly, communicative, and followed my directions to the tee. Not to mention that she also offers competitive rates. I'm looking forward to working with her again in the future, and have already recommended her to a few friends.

seller_response.comment: Thank you Kathy 😃 some clients are like sunshine 🌞  I look forward to collaborating again

reviews.comment: Very great job! Absolutely killed it on the site we designed. She was great with communication. Over delivered and was very responsive and made changes as we needed them. 100% going to use her again for any site in future

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback Michael 😀

reviews.comment: We gave a pretty difficult design to this seller and to our amazement, she was able to deliver the website exactly the same as the Figma file and how it was intended. Would definitel recommend this seller and will definitely work with her again when we have another WordPress website to create.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the wonderful feedback 😀 Hope we do business again soon!
